meanings.definition: To cry or sob loudly and uncontrollably.
meanings.sent1: She boohooed when she dropped her ice cream.
meanings.sent2: The baby boohooed all night long.
meanings.sent3: The clown boohooed so loudly that even the elephants stopped to listen.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds boohooed as the thunder roared in the distance.
meanings.sent5: Her heart boohooed with sadness as she watched the sad movie.

meanings.definition: Cried or sobbed loudly and uncontrollably.

meanings.sent3: The cat boohooed dramatically after being scolded for knocking over a vase.
meanings.sent4: The old house boohooed with creaks and groans in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent5: The wind boohooed through the trees, creating a haunting melody.
